name: Tracer (itch) (Espion Games)
description:
Race down the gauntlet, faster and faster! How far can you go before you crash?

Pick up shields, power ups, and bonus points, if you can...

Items

Shields - Shields protect your ship when you run into hazards.

Power Ups - Power can be used to speed up , slow down, and repair your ship.

Bonus Gates - Collect these for bonus points!

Controls

A - Move Left
D - Move Right

hold W - Boost (uses Power)
hold S - Slow (uses Power)
hit Spacebar - Repair (uses Power)

Credits

Made in Unity, Asset Forge, and Photoshop. Thanks to Flyover Indies and MidCoast Game Developers for feedback, testing, and support. Thanks to Catlike Coding for inspiration and a really fantastic tutorial to base this on.

  • SFX - Kenney
  • SFX - Anomaex
  • Music and SFX - Antti Luode
  • Font - Geronimo Font Studios
